item.title: Set and verify required fields
item.description: Set and verify required fields Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the Front Office. Click on Sign in". Login" The Your account" page is displayed" Click on the Addresses" block. Click on “Create a new address” link" The New address" page is displayed" Fill up the fields: First name. Last name. Address. Zip/postal code. City. Click on Save" Address is saved.

item.title: Filter
item.description: Filter Steps Step Description Expected result Go to customers > addresses page Page title contains ‘Addresses’ reset all filters Number of products > 0 filter by id : 2 At least one address is displayed First row column id = 2 reset all filters Number of products after reset = total of addresses filter by firstname ‘John’ At least one address is displayed

item.title: CRUD
item.description: CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Go to customers > addresses page Page title contains ‘Addresses’ reset all filters Number of addresses > 0 go to add new address page page title contains ‘Add new’ Create address email : faker.internet.email dni : ‘' alias : faker.address.streetAddress firstname : faker.name.firstName lastName : faker.name.lastName company : faker.company.companyName vatNumber : ‘'

item.title: Bulk Actions
item.description: Bulk Actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to customers > addresses page Page title contains ‘Addresses’ reset all filters Number of addresses > 0 go to add new address page page title contains ‘Add new’ Create first address address: ‘todelete’ Successful message is displayed number of addresses = total of addresses + 1 go to add new address page page title contains ‘Add new’ Create second address address: ‘todelete’ Successful message is displayed
